price: 71. Waxay yidhaahdeen: Waxaan caa-    budi asnaam, oo ag yuruursan (fadhin).
arabic: قَالُواْ نَعۡبُدُ أَصۡنَامٗا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَٰكِفِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū naʿbudu aṣnāman fanaẓallu lahā ʿākifīna
